title: Verify Deep linking
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the website
custom_steps: When the user Deep links to Opening Day Pick Em'
custom_expected: Then the user is redirected to the "Opening Day Pick Em'" page

title: Verify Ads
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_steps: When the usre lands on "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_expected: Then the user must see "Opening Day Pick Em'" page ad

title: Verify Web Elements
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_steps: When the usre lands on "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_expected: Then the user must see "Opening Day Pick Em'" page web elements(Selected Picks, games)

title: Game selections - User Selects 15 picks
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_steps: When the user selects picks upto 15
custom_expected: Then the selected picks must be 15/15

title: Verify Form Web Elements
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_steps: When the user lands on "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_expected: Then the user must see Form web elements(Email, Birth date, Zip, submit button, about)

title: Verify form submission
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_steps:
When the user selects pick 
And fill form and submit with capcha
And runs javascript code to see form objects
custom_expected: Then the user his/hers selection in the form object

title: Coppa
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_steps:
When the user selects pick
And fill form with user age under 13 years and submits
custom_expected: Then the user must see form ineligible text

title: API Status 200 OK
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_steps: When I make an API call to "https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?sportId=1&date=2020-03-26&hydrate=team,probablePitcher,person"
custom_expected: Then I verify that the status is 200 OK

title: Verify Logo
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_steps: When the user lands on "Opening Day Pick Em'" page
custom_expected: Then the user must see Pick Em Page Logo
